How to Fit Wide Running Shoes for Women

Choosing the perfect running shoe for wide feet is all about finding the right fit. Over time, an improper fit can lead to joint pain and bunions. The ball of your feet (where the toes meet the rest of the foot) should sit at the widest point of the shoe.
